sourcesContent: import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Site } from '@/model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-site-list', templateUrl: './site-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./site-list.component.scss'], }) export class SiteListComponent { @Input() show: boolean = false; headers = Object.keys(this.tableData[0]).filter((key) => key !== 'id'); toggleTableView() { this.show = !this.show; } }
